json: {"filters":[],"fields":[["name","Sales Order"],["docstatus","Sales Order"],["transaction_date","Sales Order"],["customer","Sales Order"],["po_no","Sales Order"],["grand_total","Sales Order"],["status","Sales Order"],["sales_person_username","Sales Order"],["currency","Sales Order"]],"order_by":"`tabSales Order`.`modified` desc","add_totals_row":0,"page_length":20,"column_widths":{"name":182,"transaction_date":103,"customer":272,"po_no":184,"grand_total":150,"status":142,"sales_person_username":120,"currency":100},"group_by":null}
name: Sales Order Report
query:
SELECT 
  name AS 'ID:Link/Sales Order:170',
  transaction_date AS 'Date:Date:100',
  customer AS 'Customer:Data:150',
  po_no AS 'Customer''s Purchase Order:110',
  grand_total AS 'Grand Total:100',
  per_delivered AS '%% Delivered:100',
  status AS 'Status:150',
  currency AS 'Currency:200'
FROM 
  `tabSales Order`
WHERE
  docstatus = 1;
